languages.text: "Элантах, твое появление смешало мои пути — и приподняло завесу, что скрывала от меня истину. Находясь подле повелительницы людей, я не видела знаков — знаков того, что над Лилэтан нависла иная угроза, нежели чем деяния мон-кай. Она должна быть вам знакома — как знакома иным разумным племенам галактики. Мы зовем ее Сай'лантреш. Та, Что Жаждет. Богиня Хаоса".

traits.locale_text: "Эл'антар, твое появление смешало мои пути — и приподняло завесу, что скрывала от меня истину. Находясь подле повелительницы людей, я не видела знаков — знаков того, что над Лилэтан нависла иная угроза, нежели чем деяния мон-кай. Она должна быть вам знакома — как знакома иным разумным племенам галактики. Мы зовем ее Сай'лантреш. Та, Что Жаждет. Богиня Хаоса".

languages.text: "Elantach, your arrival has thrown my paths into disarray — and lifted the veil on the truth that had been hidden from me. While I was shadowing the humans' ruler, I failed to see the signs — signs that there was another threat looming over the Lilaethan besides the mon-keigh's deeds. The threat should be familiar to you, as it is to other intelligent species in the galaxy. We call it Sai'lanthresh. She Who Thirsts. Goddess of Chaos."
languages.original_text: "Элантах, твое появление смешало мои пути — и приподняло завесу, что скрывала от меня истину. Находясь подле повелительницы людей, я не видела знаков — знаков того, что над Лилэтан нависла иная угроза, нежели чем деяния мон-кай. Она должна быть вам знакома — как знакома иным разумным племенам галактики. Мы зовем ее Сай'лантреш. Та, Что Жаждет. Богиня Хаоса".

While I was shadowing the humans' ruler, I failed to see the signs — signs that there was another threat looming over the Lilaethan besides the mon-keigh's deeds. The threat should be familiar to you, as it is to other intelligent species in the galaxy. We call it Sai'lanthresh. She Who Thirsts. Goddess of Chaos."

The threat should be familiar to you, as it is to other intelligent species in the galaxy. We call it Sai'lanthresh. She Who Thirsts. Goddess of Chaos."

The threat should be familiar to you, as it is to other intelligent species in the galaxy. We call it Sai'lanthresh. She Who Thirsts. Goddess of Chaos."

"Elantach, your arrival has thrown my paths into disarray — and lifted the veil on the truth that had been hidden from me. While I was shadowing the humans' ruler, I failed to see the signs — signs that there was another threat looming over the Lilaethan besides the mon-keigh's deeds. The threat should be familiar to you, as it is to other intelligent species in the galaxy. We call it Sai'lanthresh. She Who Thirsts. Goddess of Chaos."

languages.text: 「エランタ、あなたが来てからというもの、我が道は混迷を迎えている…だが、我から隠されていた真実のベールも取り払われた。人間の支配者を尾行している間に、兆しを見逃していた…それは、モン＝ケイの行いに加え、リラエタンを覆っているもう一つの脅威の兆し。あなたも含め、この銀河にいる他の知的生命体がよく知っている脅威。我々はそれをセランスレッシュと呼んでいる。かの渇きたる女。渾沌の女神」
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your arrival has thrown my paths into disarray — and lifted the veil on the truth that had been hidden from me. While I was shadowing the humans' ruler, I failed to see the signs — signs that there was another threat looming over the Lilaethan besides the mon-keigh's deeds. The threat should be familiar to you, as it is to other intelligent species in the galaxy. We call it Sai'lanthresh. She Who Thirsts. Goddess of Chaos."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、あなたが来てからというもの、我が道は混迷を迎えている…だが、我から隠されていた真実のベールも取り払われた。人間の支配者を尾行している間に、兆しを見逃していた…それは、モン＝ケイの行いに加え、リラエタンを覆っているもう一つの脅威の兆し。あなたも含め、この銀河にいる他の知的生命体がよく知っている脅威。我々はそれをセランスレッシュと呼んでいる。かの渇きたる女。渾沌の女神」

languages.text: “外界人，你的到来让我的道途陷入了混乱，也揭开了那些掩盖真相的面纱。当我跟在人类的统治者身边时，我看漏了一部分迹象。那些迹象表明，除了猴子的所作所为之外，莉莱赞所面临的还有另一个威胁。那个威胁你们应该很熟悉，整个银河系中的其他智慧生物也同样很熟悉。那个威胁我们称之为赛·兰斯雷什，饥渴女士，混沌女神。”
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your arrival has thrown my paths into disarray — and lifted the veil on the truth that had been hidden from me. While I was shadowing the humans' ruler, I failed to see the signs — signs that there was another threat looming over the Lilaethan besides the mon-keigh's deeds. The threat should be familiar to you, as it is to other intelligent species in the galaxy. We call it Sai'lanthresh. She Who Thirsts. Goddess of Chaos."

traits.locale_text: “外界人，你的到来让我的道途陷入了混乱，也揭开了那些掩盖真相的面纱。当我跟在人类的统治者身边时，我看漏了一部分迹象。那些迹象表明，除了猴子的所作所为之外，莉莱赞所面临的还有另一个威胁。那个威胁你们应该很熟悉，整个银河系中的其他智慧生物也同样很熟悉。那个威胁我们称之为赛·兰斯雷什，饥渴女士，混沌女神。”

languages.text: «Elantach, tu llegada ha trastocado mis sendas y retirado el velo que me ocultaba la realidad. Mientras seguía al líder de los humanos, no supe identificar las señales que indicaban la existencia de otra amenaza que se cierne sobre el Lilaethan, más allá de las fechorías de la mon-keigh. Una amenaza que debería resultarte familiar, como lo es para otras especies inteligentes de la galaxia. Nosotros la llamamos Sai'lanthresh. La Sedienta. Una diosa del Caos».
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your arrival has thrown my paths into disarray — and lifted the veil on the truth that had been hidden from me. While I was shadowing the humans' ruler, I failed to see the signs — signs that there was another threat looming over the Lilaethan besides the mon-keigh's deeds. The threat should be familiar to you, as it is to other intelligent species in the galaxy. We call it Sai'lanthresh. She Who Thirsts. Goddess of Chaos."

traits.locale_text: «Elantach, tu llegada ha trastocado mis sendas y retirado el velo que me ocultaba la realidad. Mientras seguía al líder de los humanos, no supe identificar las señales que indicaban la existencia de otra amenaza que se cierne sobre el Lilaethan, más allá de las fechorías de la mon-keigh. Una amenaza que debería resultarte familiar, como lo es para otras especies inteligentes de la galaxia. Nosotros la llamamos Sai'lanthresh. La Sedienta. Una diosa del Caos».

languages.text: "Elantach, Euer Eintreffen hat meine Wege in Unordnung gebracht – und den Schleier über der Wahrheit gelüftet, die vor mir verborgen gehalten wurde. Während ich die Herrscherin der Menschen überwachte, entgingen mir die Zeichen – Zeichen, dass außer den Taten der Chem-Pan-Sey noch eine andere Bedrohung über Lileath schwebte. Diese Bedrohung müsste Euch vertraut sein, wie anderen intelligenten Spezies in der Galaxie auch. Wir nennen sie Sai'lanthresh. Sie, die dürstet. Göttin des Chaos."
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your arrival has thrown my paths into disarray — and lifted the veil on the truth that had been hidden from me. While I was shadowing the humans' ruler, I failed to see the signs — signs that there was another threat looming over the Lilaethan besides the mon-keigh's deeds. The threat should be familiar to you, as it is to other intelligent species in the galaxy. We call it Sai'lanthresh. She Who Thirsts. Goddess of Chaos."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, Euer Eintreffen hat meine Wege in Unordnung gebracht – und den Schleier über der Wahrheit gelüftet, die vor mir verborgen gehalten wurde. Während ich die Herrscherin der Menschen überwachte, entgingen mir die Zeichen – Zeichen, dass außer den Taten der Chem-Pan-Sey noch eine andere Bedrohung über Lileath schwebte. Diese Bedrohung müsste Euch vertraut sein, wie für andere intelligente Spezies in der Galaxie auch. Wir nennen sie Sai'lanthresh. Sie, die dürstet. Göttin des Chaos."

languages.text: « Elantach, votre arrivée a bouleversé les voies qui s'offrent à moi et levé le voile sur la vérité que l'on me cache depuis trop longtemps. Tout occupée que j'étais à observer la dirigeante des humains, je n'ai pas su voir les signes... des signes indiquant qu'une autre menace planait sur la lilaethan, en plus des actes commis par les mon-keigh. Cette menace ne vous sera pas inconnue, elle est déjà notoire auprès des autres espèces intelligentes de la galaxie. Nous l'appelons Sai'lanthresh, l'Assoiffée, la déesse du Chaos. »
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your arrival has thrown my paths into disarray — and lifted the veil on the truth that had been hidden from me. While I was shadowing the humans' ruler, I failed to see the signs — signs that there was another threat looming over the Lilaethan besides the mon-keigh's deeds. The threat should be familiar to you, as it is to other intelligent species in the galaxy. We call it Sai'lanthresh. She Who Thirsts. Goddess of Chaos."

traits.locale_text: « Elantach, votre arrivée a bouleversé les voies qui s'offrent à moi et levé le voile sur la vérité que l'on me cache depuis trop longtemps. Tout occupée que j'étais à observer la dirigeante des humains, je n'ai pas su voir les signes... des signes indiquant qu'une autre menace planait sur la lilaethan, en plus des actes commis par les mon-keigh. Cette menace ne vous sera pas inconnue, elle est déjà notoire auprès des autres espèces intelligentes de la galaxie. Nous l'appelons Sai'lanthresh, l'Assoiffée, la déesse du Chaos. »

languages.text: "Elantach... Gelişin yollarımı dolambaçlandırdı ve benden gizlenen hakikatin üstündeki örtüyü kaldırdı. İnsanların hükümdarını izlerken Lilaethan'a tek tehdidin mon-keigh olmadığına dair işaretleri fark edememiştim. Bu tehdide, galaksideki diğer akıllı türler kadar siz de aşina olmalısınız. Biz kendisine Sai'lanthresh, Susayan, Kaos Tanrıçası diyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your arrival has thrown my paths into disarray — and lifted the veil on the truth that had been hidden from me. While I was shadowing the humans' ruler, I failed to see the signs — signs that there was another threat looming over the Lilaethan besides the mon-keigh's deeds. The threat should be familiar to you, as it is to other intelligent species in the galaxy. We call it Sai'lanthresh. She Who Thirsts. Goddess of Chaos."
